Ref Type Reference

Namespace

ohm::flip

Declared in

ohm/flip/Ref.h

Overview

The Ref type is a 64 bits integer that represents a Flip reference number.

The type itself can be seen as a bit field, splitted in the following way :

Those constants are declared in ohm/flip/private/SeedGenerator.h . Their values are believed to be a good balance between the number of clients, threads and objects that can cohabitate in a document.
